Reviews.Title: Top notch product and service!
Reviews.Author: Beanie
Reviews.Content: The tablet is solid, robust, fast and full of features.  Money well spent.  Excellent tablet! Excellent customer service! Exceeded our expectations in many ways!

Reviews.Title: My 8 year old daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: kristie bridgeman
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  My daughter loves that there is a camera to also take pictures.  It ended up becoming an early christmas present, she liked it so much :)

Reviews.Title: You DON'T get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Noah
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet because I wanted a replacement for my iPad 1st generation and although it didn't entrily replace it it came very close. Who needs a big name company with over priced tablets when you have this. I thought this thing would just fall apart after the first day or two and then I would have to send it back and start my search over to find a good quality tablet.

Reviews.Title: so far so GOOD......
Reviews.Author: Police7942
Reviews.Content: I purchased three of this for Christmas for my children and when they arrived I unboxed each of them and powered them up. Powered up very quickly and log right on to my WiFi. Went directly to YouTube and It played the video with no problems. The only thing I seen that I would say improve on would be the screen. It's not near as clear as my 10 inch Samsung tablet. But for the money the quality is great and I do recommend this product to anyone especially if you want something for children.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Gilbert Feliciano II
Reviews.Content: I own an Ipad and was surprised how well this product works. I'm having a little trouble to get Netflicks to run correctly but I haven't viewed the instructions yet. Eventually I'll get it to work. This tablet performs very well for the price. I actually bought a second one to give out as a gift. I give it 5 stars within its category.Miami, FL

Reviews.Title: Small but very good
Reviews.Author: C. KENNEDY "drkculan64"
Reviews.Content: Nicely priced and very decent. Having gone through five e-book readers/tablets in 2 1/2 years, this one is decent. It is fast, has good video resolution, and a good amount of storage for apps, books, and music. Also the object arrived fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Prontotec Tablet
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Livingston
Reviews.Content: I'm a return customer of this buyer, bought 3 tablets from Prontotec, for Christmas, all delivered within promised time frame which is great.Well, haven't thoroughly used it as this is a gift, overall the quality is good, Google Play was pre-loaded, apps download pretty quickly and runs well, no lagging, guess the dual core process does a good job.Great tablet for kid I guess, recommended.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!!! Fun!! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: happyivyhouse
Reviews.Content: This tablet came 2 weeks earlier than expected. My husband loves his new Android Tablet. We added an extra storage card of course and was able to get it up and running right away. He uses it mostly for listening to music and radio dramas and games! He also checks his email more often now, yeah! This is an Excellent for Fun Tablet.  My 7 year old gets one next!

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: jubilee
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my kids. Its a great tablet for the price. Its fast but the picture quality isn't as great as a samsung.  Definately worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Okay tablet
Reviews.Author: Danyel S
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 11 year old daughter for bringing home good grades. I love the table and she does too! The one thing I don't like is the camera. The table has a flash on the back and that is what drew me to purchasing it. You can't really take a good clear picture. The flash is there and does not do anything for the picture. She has to hold the tablet in the light in order to take a clear picture. It's a great starter tablet. Just don't expect to take good pictures with it...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet for all round purpose, great value.
Reviews.Author: rpv
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5G', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; } // ]]> var cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GRollOverImg = new Image(); cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GRollOverImg.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81iFyaIbH8S._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; var cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay = document.getElementById('cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GpreplayImageId'); if (cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay) { cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay.onmouseover = function() { cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81iFyaIbH8S._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/81iFyaIbH8S._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5Gpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GcurrentClick) { return cv_mo2KWHT3QAG4R5GcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 8:31 MinsProntoTec 7 inch Dual Core Tablet is a very good value in price per performance. It has 4 GB SDRAM. After installing bunch of applications, I still had available 2 GB. This runs Android 4.2.2. Android. Unlike other reviewers I did not face any issue at all out of the box and have been using for 3 days with no issues. Obviously you should know the feature set and use within the limit. I will go into the specifications and review based on my user experience. I had no hardware or hang issues with this tablet. Look at my video review for a detailed review of processing power. A play of Temple Run Oz and Youtube streaming. I also have lot of screen shots and they speak for themselves. I request you to go through the video review to see the power of this phone.Most of tablets have ARM based processors. This makes sure all of the Apps in Google Play ecosystem are available. This has Cortex A8 Dual Core 1.2 GHz. If you look at my video review, I have screenshots showing the CPU speed and other kernel details. The screen is 800 x 480 Pixels and has a RAM of 512MB. This supports a wireless and cellular with Wi-Fi (802.11 BGN) and Support for 3G Dongles. Settings page has a IMEI number already assigned. Tablet has 2 cameras - Front 0.3M/Rear 2M. There is a built-in 2800mAh Rechargeable Lithium Battery. Battery came for a good 5 hours with moderate usage. Battery usage really depends on how heavy you use the system. Overnight it drained very less. Mobile Networking was on by default. I switched off as I was using only Wi-Fi mode. I suggest you go to Settings and tweak things which are not required. Developer Mode was enabled by default. I turned it off. The capacitive touch screen was really good, some occasions I had to press little harder and at right locations, but pinch-zoom, highlight, Copy-Paste all worked very well.The tablet has micro USB Port, 3.5-mm stereo Headphone Jack, built-in speaker, microphone, micro SD card slot and a DC Input Jack. Note that for powering through wall adapter you need to use the provided DC input jack. Speaker was loud enough. IN a room, once I keep the tablet in a stand it was good. Speaker is on the backside. HDMI interface is also good for connecting to HDTVs.Android tablets are really customizable to your heart's content. It is here where ProntoTec shines. Using a native Android 4.2.2, they have achieved something at a low cost. This can have a very wide reaching audience. In many countries, where affordability is key, having a tablet like this with Wi-Fi is a big boon. Imagine having entire Wikipedia at your fingertips for a child. I tried few educational applications on this. I consider this as a big hit with educators than gamers.I tried Google Voice Search and asked "what is capital of United States". The voice recognition part was great and it was able to recognize and dictate the answer. I also tried Wolfram Alpha and asked bunch of questions. E.g., what is world population, what is population of China etc? The microphone picked up correctly and answered through Wolfram Alpha. Apps like Calculator, Gmail performed flawlessly.I watched multiple video through few applications. Obvious first choice was YouTube. Was able to search and watch videos. I used TwIT.TV app and watched some segments of a podcast (video streaming through wifi). Again smooth playback. Handholding is really easy given the weight of it. It was a colorful blue; no heat observed handholding the tablet. It is plastic, and buttons are made of plastic. For a kid, this is perfect also though the feature set is equally appealing to an adult. I was so enamored with low cost computers in late 90s and it seems I am reliving them with tablet. If you want to listen to podcasts/watch video then this is perfect. Just keep it in a stand and connect to power. See my video review to get an idea of what I am referring to. For a computer geek, it is a challenge to design something with minimal resources - screen resolution, RAM, storage, chipset. ProntoTec has designed a tablet with budget conscious customer in mind. Out of the box, it worked to my satisfaction given the specification and price. Once powered on, it directly came to a working condition. No need to setup account prior to using. I signed with wifi, the wifi router was in one bedroom. I configured in another room separated by two rooms. There was no issue with wifi signal. Once connected, I created a Google account as well. I generated a Application Specific password as I had 2 factor authentication. Once signed on, I updated applications like YouTube, Google Keyboard etc. I also downloaded few applications like TwitT.TV, Tetris from EA, etc. I downloaded Chrome and browsed few websites. Listened to Audio / Watched Video. Out of the box battery needed a full charge. Initially without charge, I did a video stream and wanted to see how device shutdown. Sure enough it shut down as battery drained. Powered on after charging and everything was fine.I am impressed enough at the engineering for the price/value/budget it delivers. Cortex-A8 Processor is an ARM Cortex(tm)-A8 processor, based on the ARMv7 architecture, has the ability to scale in speed from 600MHz to greater than 1GHz. The Cortex-A8 processor can meet the requirements for power-optimized mobile devices needing operation in less than 300mW; and performance-optimized consumer applications requiring 2000 Dhrystone MIPS. This is from ARM specification. ProntoTec has pulled in many off the shelf components and assembled at a terrific value. I was particularly interested how it performs to streaming video. That is the golden test and it performed beautifully!

Reviews.Title: Little glitches
Reviews.Author: Margaret Duste-Phenicie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who wanted one for Christmas. He says that there are some little glitches and the camera is not so great.  It seems to lose his downloads quite a bit and he has to download them again. He is going through his accounts and see what works and what does not to set it up so it works better.

Reviews.Title: just what i needed
Reviews.Author: amiliamarie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son. Put my accounts on it so I would know his every move. It works great. And have had no problems with it.glad I found it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: diania moll
Reviews.Content: actually bought it for my boyfriend and he loves it! for the price it is a good buy. buy it.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Jim M.
Reviews.Content: Very nice.  Exactly as shown, and was pleasantly surprised by how easy is was to set up and use once it was fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Sandra Michelin
Reviews.Content: Even though it took a long time to get this tablet and I had to return the first one, I am happy with it. My grandson loves it and use it all the time!

Reviews.Title: perfect tablet- can't beat the value
Reviews.Author: ANON
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet because the reviews were so amazing and the price was just right.  The tablet came 10 days before the estimated delivery date. The tablet is very pretty in white, the screen resolution is nice and the sound is excellent!!!  My nine year old is very pleased with his new tablet. This works just as well as the expensive ones and let's you save your money.  Play store is available on it and you can download the kindle app and Netflix...perfect for our needs.  Buy this tablet - you will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: my 10 yr. old son loves it!
Reviews.Author: L. Snider "twinmom"
Reviews.Content: my son has had no problems with this tablet. he previously had a 'smartab' tablet and had to return it do to defects. so far this one has been great!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: kita
Reviews.Content: First  I didn't think I would like it but its actually a good tablet especially for the price. It connected to my WiFi with no problems. Its pretty fast which is what I like the most. Most apps compatible. I couldn't DL the amazon tablet app which was disappointing but hopefully soon it will compatible soon. Other than that I like it. would recommend to anybody looking for a replacement tablet, buying a tablet for the first time, or for kids.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablets, Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Even though I fully expected the two tablets I purchased to show up after Christmas, ProntoTec quickly emailed me with an apology on the matter and stated they would be sending me leather cases with my order as a gift. Devices work great and my children love them. Very satisfied with the tablets and ProntoTec's customer service. Will definitely do business with again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent gift for my students.....They Love their tablet!!
Reviews.Author: Patricia W.
Reviews.Content: "I purchased all 3 tablets for my students (2 students earned Microsoft Certification and the other student had the highest GPA...Top Dolphin) and the purchase price was excellent. The students were very pleased with this gift and the other teachers could not believe I made such a purchase. Each student received a different color (pink, blue, or white). They received their gift at the 8th grade Award Ceremony.  One of my students helped the others with the setup. The parents of the students were also amazed by the purchase.  I told each of them to register the tablets. No complaints."

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Sandra J.
Reviews.Content: My 11 year old grandaughter loves this tablet.  She's on it all the time.  Don't know how it will hold up long term, but, for the price it's been a great product so far.

Reviews.Title: Great for two months!
Reviews.Author: 82AA
Reviews.Content: Tablet worked great for two months! Seemed to be well made. Good graphics. Went to power it up one day and it wouldnt turn on. Tried to reset but it wouldnt. Cant return it so I guess its a waste of money. Dont waste your money on this device. Spend a little more and get a good one.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Luis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: CPU:Dual Core 1.2GHzType:7 inch capacitive 16:9 / 5-point touch screen, TFT 800*480 pixelsRAM: 512MB DDR3, Internal Memory:4GB NAND Flash. Expansion Memory:Support micro SD/TF card up to 32GOperating System: Android 4.2 ; Supports Flash, Wifi, and videosSupports Google Play Store, Skype, YouTube, and more!

Reviews.Title: is the worst product I purchased, not served. it sucks
Reviews.Author: Rafael Rivas
Reviews.Content: is the worst product I purchased, not served. sucks, battery and charger not working.anyone buy this product is lousy bad

Reviews.Title: Good basic tablet
Reviews.Author: Lees
Reviews.Content: For the price I got it for under $60 it is good. No major issues just very slow with the internet. Have downloaded apps. Most apps work fine. Have watched a few videos and they were fine but a tad slow. No issues so far. Good for the money.

Reviews.Title: A great deal.
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: This was my first experience with any tablet.  Happy I purchased it.  It was a great price, I use the web, play a few games and use it for email.

Reviews.Title: the touch screen does not work
Reviews.Author: Francisco C.
Reviews.Content: after a week I have bought you damage the touch screen and Venezuela that kind of touch screen fails to give me hope that guarantee to buy the tablet

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: emma diaz
Reviews.Content: excelente producto!

Reviews.Title: STOPPED WORKING!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Matheson
Reviews.Content: It worked great for 1 month. Then quit charging. Took it to professional and they said it wasn't worth cost to fix. The inside charge part was not making contact and was loose. Tried contacting Prontotec....no answer. No help from Amazon either. Was suppose to be new from factory, but it had obliviously been opened used and sent back. Not pleased at all. Would not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Looks nice!
Reviews.Author: La Classe22150
Reviews.Content: Looks cute! I bought for a 3 year old boy but he love it He can stop playing with it. The price is also reasonable.

Reviews.Title: nice tablet for a nice price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Mrs. Linda Finn"
Reviews.Content: Works great, no issues with the tablet whatsoever.  My 10 year old really loves it and I am so happy to have got them for my kids.Linda

Reviews.Title: Cant hear without headphones
Reviews.Author: Jai
Reviews.Content: Ive tried everything. I can't hear without plugging in my headphones. Even when I turn the volumes to the maximum I can't hear anything.Please tell me what to do.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: BBB
Reviews.Content: great for the price, super great.  only thing is low amount of storage memory.  i had to add an sd card, and a lot of apps dont have option to transfer to sd card, so we filled up the available apps space fast with kid games, got this for my 2 year old, and he abuses it, throws it.  it still works great, no cracks yet.

Reviews.Title: I really like my tablet
Reviews.Author: The REAL ROXANNE "~~~Ms Roxie~~~"
Reviews.Content: Really good tablet for the price. I am very pleased. I don't use it very often but it is good to have if i don't wanna haul my laptop.

Reviews.Title: Get This one
Reviews.Author: bea
Reviews.Content: okay, so first off i bought the black version of this, because it was a bit cheaper but when it came on like 10 percent battery and the battery goes fast when you have it on full brightness but i didn't know that. Anyways what happened was it died so i put it on the charger and waited and waited for like 3 hours but it still wouldn't turn on and Yes i  did look at the instructions and it didn't say anything about it. so i waited till the morning since it was like 8:00 at night. And in the morning it still didn't work so i just put everything in the box and shipped it back. The sealer said that we could buy this one since it was only 10 bucks more, so i got this white one. And this time when i got it i didn't make the mistake of not charging it. And personally i love this version anyways; because it has everything and more the Ipad has but its better do don't buy the black one buy this one!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Tablet
Reviews.Author: Mike Bosela
Reviews.Content: They say the battery is bad but it is not it will recharge a lot on its own and is pretty good on it's own it is really good has important apps preinstalled and runs great I have had it for a little while but already love it.

Reviews.Title: will not start, put a load more than eight hours and does not work
Reviews.Author: yulimir "YULIMIR MANZANARES"
Reviews.Content: good morning, sorry I am from Venezuela and this team came in dates of April 10 this year in poor condition, will not start, put a load more than eight hours and does not work, they are responsible people, but I need to please answer me .. thanks for your attention

Reviews.Title: cheap, but...
Reviews.Author: Vicky Gabriel
Reviews.Content: i dont like it that much. the keyboard almost never pops up when you need it. the internet browser is closing itself all the time (even downloaded a different one. when you put the tablet by side for a second and you are trying to use it shortly afterwards again, the homepage you were on is gone. it is freezing a lot too. Watching something via streaming over internet is impossible.still, it is cheap, good battery, very light. i guess is great for on the way.

Reviews.Title: this is the worst
Reviews.Author: hanniff murrell
Reviews.Content: the wireless suck and the space suck more this was a waste of my money and time will never tell some one to buy one so

Reviews.Title: good tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Robert Penrod
Reviews.Content: Bought the tablet for my mother she loves it ! it works well came ontime fully charged very hap! ! !  ! !py

Reviews.Title: Pronto tec
Reviews.Author: toni andrews
Reviews.Content: Having a hard time getting things to download. I buy them & are charged for them and the apps are showing but the content isn't there.

Reviews.Title: looking to buy another one soon.
Reviews.Author: Kelly Middleton
Reviews.Content: I bought this for Christmas. Of course - I bought the protection because it was cheep and I was not expecting a lot from it, however I have been very pleased so far. I only use it for candy crush, kindle aps, and e-mail..... That may be why it works so well.

Reviews.Title: great tween entry level tablet
Reviews.Author: greg mathews
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet on its level of specks in mind for my 10 year old daughter! She has had it for a month. I am pleased with the performance so far. OS can be a bit more interactive, but all around works well.

Reviews.Title: Android
Reviews.Author: Joyce wilkinson
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Granddaughter for Christmas. It does everything she needs to do, instagram, games, video chats. She is always using this tablet. No complaints yet.

Reviews.Title: Small and efficient.
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A. Daniels
Reviews.Content: Only complaint I have is with the life of the battery. The frequency of having to charge it. Overall great little tablet.

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Dusty R. Usher
Reviews.Content: Got this for daughter and it works great compared to some others out there at similar price. Took a really long time to get but happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Present
Reviews.Author: C. M. Denny
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, It was enjoyed very much! Had no problems at all, would purchase again without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: impressed
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: I'm truly impressed with this tablet. This is my first tablet so I do not have anything to compare it to however I son not have any complaint. It has internet with apps and that it about what I use it for. You really just can't beat the price for what you get.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Mianca Mclendon
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son. He loves it and it's a good price. The only thing I didn't like was that it was shipped late and I didn't receive it when I was supposed to

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Edward Abrams
Reviews.Content: SO I've had this tablet for over a week, and i'm content with it. It's good for taking notes for class. (with note taking app)Storage space isnt that much but i bought a 16G card which makes storage easierUnfortunately if you're looking to buy this for online streaming like YouTube and Netflix, it's not the bestBut I did manage to get some movie files (From DVD's) onto the 16G card, and was able to watch them no problem.The battery isnt the best either, but it's tolerable. All in all I say so far it was a good buy

Reviews.Title: Great graphics
Reviews.Author: Michael B.
Reviews.Content: Recipient loved the gift. Everything works as intended. The only gripe here is that the battery life doesn't seem to last as long as one would like. Heavy gaming drops the battery to 50% in a half hour.

Reviews.Title: love  this tablet worth the bucks!
Reviews.Author: Ms,love
Reviews.Content: 1st tablet and sturdy nice went off but reset it works with keyboard well it seem it went off useing it i order it dec30 arrive jan 15 2014 but shows good quality nice clear videos it wasnt connecting either ,i give it 5 stars if it just went to you tube & other sites i guess you sappose find a connection or pay for data.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Sadi WAlker
Reviews.Content: If u dont want to pay alot for a tablet, I will suggest this product, the camera isn't all tht but I dont use it much but overall its a good tablet

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for a small price...
Reviews.Author: Lori Braham
Reviews.Content: Works great-  we bought them for our kids and for the price, I have no complaints!  No- it's not an ipad, but that's not what we expected.  This has actually exceeded our expectations.

Reviews.Title: Prontotec 7 inch Android
Reviews.Author: tammy
Reviews.Content: I bought one for my grandson and he loves it. he downloaded a lot of games and they downloaded pretty fast.

Reviews.Title: would definitely order again
Reviews.Author: Betty Heacock
Reviews.Content: I ordered for my husband.  Could not figure out how to delete pictures sent note back received answer right back was very simple.  This product is a great device plus great price would order again, and would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Connectivity issues from day one.
Reviews.Author: Jonie F.
Reviews.Content: Tablet was recognized by network right out of the box with a strong signal,but by day 2, showed a "no connection available" message when trying to connect to Google, Play Store or the internet although the wi-fi signal remained strong throughout. This fatal flaw rendered the tablet totally useless. The only good thing about this transaction was Amazon Prime's  timely delivery and convenient return policies. Overall, a frustrating and disappointing purchase.

Reviews.Title: Not well built
Reviews.Author: James Porter
Reviews.Content: My son loved this tablet but there have been issues of freezing since he has had it. Now in just four months it freezes at the first screen. It will not go any futher than that. Right away you will notice the poor construction when you hold it. I was looking to get at least a year out of the tablet. It's a great price but sometimes paying more money for quality is better.

Reviews.Title: Its a nice cheap tablet but......
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: The only thing I see on this tablet is that I am unable to use Netflix on this. This was one of the main reasons I bought this. I am able to get sound but no Video on it. Everything else seems to work on the app but if you want to actually want to watch videos then good luck.If anyone knows a fix I would love to know what it is.

Reviews.Title: Terrible battery but so far still a good buy
Reviews.Author: K. Dias "Clad in All Clad"
Reviews.Content: Not expecting anything big from this tablet at this price point, but the battery doesn't last more than a few hours of moderate use.  I am just using this as a Windows Media Center remote, so it is not the end of the world... But if you need a robust tablet with good battery power, this probably isn't it.On the positive side, there are some really good features for the price. Multiple cameras, USB, storage expansion make it worth considering.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: We ordered the product. Used it for a few days and than it stopped functioning properly . We are now trying to send it back

Reviews.Title: dissatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: csreviewer
Reviews.Content: Cannot even read the instructions...not easy to find pictures after taken, since there is no gallery.  Many problems since their instructions leave a lot to be desired! Very dissatisfied!

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: Got this for my grandson for Christmas.  On the 3rd day after he received it it wouldn't power up. It had been plugged in all night. Reset button didn't help. My tech savvy son in law could do nothing with it.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for maybe less
Reviews.Author: Jacen Clements
Reviews.Content: This device is what you pay for. I had it less then a day when it already started resetting itself and freezing. The casing is weak and allows dust and other particulates under the plastic. You cannot open the device to clean it. It won't run simple apps like NFL.com and a few local news apps. Generally a piece of junk. Get the drop scratch spill protection for two reasons really easy to scratch and after your first day of problems you'll want to throw it.

Reviews.Title: It quit and I'm GLAD I tell you.
Reviews.Author: The Restless Mouse "TheRestlessMouse"
Reviews.Content: I had just a day to monkey around with this thing, the on/off switch seemed hinky, and the next day it didn't work at all. It's OK, I was going to return it anyway- The screen is hard to read, it takes a long time to start up, and the volume isn't very good. Those are just the things I noticed in the half hour or so that I actually got to use it.

Reviews.Title: its junk
Reviews.Author: Catherine H.
Reviews.Content: Not only can I not return it but I bought this in January and it doesn't work any longer. This is April. You tell me.. don't waste your money. Guess its true you get what you pay for. I have no idea where to go to even ask for a replacement ugh fml!

Reviews.Title: A++ Service
Reviews.Author: Jane Krisch
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for a friend. She uses it every day and loves it. Will order another one for her in the future. Great Tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: Our first one broke in 3 days. This one has been with us for 3 months. I'm very happy with that

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Heriberto Guevara Rivero "Heriberto"
Reviews.Content: it was for my niece as a gift and she loved it! the tablet seen to be very fast and good quality better then last one I bought and had to return it, but this one GOT ALL MY EXPECTATIONS, thanks very much

Reviews.Title: nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: ANGEL "COBRA"
Reviews.Content: for the price is ok, don't expect to be apple though, but for children is enough. looks ok and feel alright

Reviews.Title: I am very dissappointed with it.
Reviews.Author: Linda J.
Reviews.Content: My tablet will not open and I think it's broke. I want to send it back!! How may I do this?

Reviews.Title: its a nice tablet
Reviews.Author: Loren Williams
Reviews.Content: Its very good really fast doesn't glance a lot very portable . this is the secound best tablet that I've had my first was a blackberry but this prontec is very good for the amazing price :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) .

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Brown
Reviews.Content: The battery life is short. Shipping takes forever and you can get a kindle at an equal if not a little higher cost (to include case, car charger, stylus and pen, etc)

Reviews.Title: dont like it
Reviews.Author: James Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace a iPod touch, I should have been smacked ... The music on this thing sounds horrible, I used 50/50 skull candy headphones that worked flawlessly on my iPod but on this thing it makes me not want to even listen to music. Videos were cool though Netflix worked fine. It took weeks to ship and it has a chinese browser called baidu that you cant remove. If you need something to browse the net or Netflix then this is for you, anything outside of that save your money for something better, giving this to my son

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Mom of 3
Reviews.Content: My 8 year old son was really happy with this. We ordered on time for Christmas and it say here that we will have it on time but latter I read that it will come January 7 so he was waiting for his present for a while but was super happy when he got itThe only reason I'm giving it four stars it's because we have Apple brand around the house and this is a Mini Pc and everything is different he had to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Karin Gandy
Reviews.Content: I HAVE NO COMPLAINTS ABOUT  THIS PRODUCT,HOPEFULLY MRE PEOPLE INVEST INTO  THIS PRODUCT. IT  IS  REALLY GREAT, AND SO CONVIENT TO USE. STORED, AND AMAZINGLY FUN TO USE,

Reviews.Title: Not too Shabby
Reviews.Author: Gwen
Reviews.Content: This was the 2nd tablet I had to order the first was sent back (different brand) So I was scared to order anything on the cheaper side but really didn't want to spend a huge amount since it was for my 5 yr old. So far it seems to work great, the battery life is a bit short and my 3 yr old is always trying to play with it ;)  but other than that I have no complaints... yet we're only on day 2.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Augustine Ukulu
Reviews.Content: I should have known better the quality of this product is crappy and again I get what I paid for, cheap. I should have spent a little bit of more money to get something better. The shipment took for ever to get to me and I was more than disappointed when I opened the box to activate the tablet. The cameral is so bad you can haldly view the pictures and the setup of the picture gallery is not worth mentioning. The biggest diasappointment is the battery life is so very short and have to keep charging it so many time in between use. This is just my second day of use and not happy with what i got. I will have to replace this very soon and give this one away.

Reviews.Title: bought for bundle value, seller refunded partial.
Reviews.Author: Maris Miller
Reviews.Content: bought for bundle value, seller refunded partial.Would not have bought just for tablet. Can't find keyboard case that will work with it.

Reviews.Title: Wouldnt allow download of apps
Reviews.Author: Diana Beckley
Reviews.Content: I tried to contact customer service about this devise but could never find where or who to call. I finally returned it to Amazon. I purchased and installed a 32 SD card and still had error messages reading, "unable to write to SD card".

Reviews.Title: Great deal.
Reviews.Author: stacy mckinster
Reviews.Content: Pleased with this tablet.  Great Black Friday price.  Great features for a tablet.  Son excited that it has netflicks capability!  Waiting to see how it holds up.  Bought for a school device so haven't used it as much as would like to yet.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Roberta L De Baggis
Reviews.Content: The product seems to be functioning okay but the user manual is a disgrace. The printing is so small so its almost impossible to read and the keys that are referenced in the instruction are black blocks so you don't know what key they are talking about.  Based on this I would not recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: Displeased with product. received in bad conditions, improperly packaged. look`s like used Item.
Reviews.Author: mildred quiles
Reviews.Content: battery don`t last long, 1 hour maybe .  do`s not work to its full potential, or at least not everything it said to do.

Reviews.Title: Sorry but not
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Johnson
Reviews.Content: It didn't work for me upon arrival.I had no experience with it at all.Sorry.pls fix problem with third party manufacturers

Reviews.Title: They do not like them
Reviews.Author: ivy
Reviews.Content: The camera does not work very well and it always shows very dark. I wish to send them back and purschase a better product.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: tanya
Reviews.Content: This product is very poor. I purchased it for my 8year old and poor kid cant play games with out it freezing all the time. I was nervous about purchasing from Amazon since i had never bought anything from this site, but alot of people said it was a good site... this was my first time and last time buying electronics from here.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: maia clarke
Reviews.Content: It was for my 7 year old. Got it last month never dropped and the screen has a big black dot in the middle.. do not recommend it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Slow loading
Reviews.Author: ollie08
Reviews.Content: I like it, but its loading slowly n has a crack in it. I dnt want to bother no one w/ that problem.
